about_the_game:
With this single set of materials, you can create modern Japanese shopping streets, station fronts, parks, and residential areas!

It consists of tiles A1, A2, A4, A3, and B.
The set also includes variations of the same tileset for daytime, evening, and nighttime, allowing you to create different effects based on the time of day.
Please enjoy creating various effects by composing your own patterns.


■Materials included

 Tiles A1, A2, A4, A3, B (15 sheets each with day, evening, and night patterns)

Tile A1: 2 types of park pond patterns
Tile A2: 8 types of grass and soil for parks, 8 tile sets suitable for shopping and residential areas
Tile A4: 12 types of building and residential patterns
Tile A5: Lanes and crosswalks on asphalt
Tile B: 6 types of store materials (facing forward and sideways), shopping arcade, building materials (pipes, outdoor units, fire escape, etc.), park materials (boats, fences, playground equipment, benches, etc.), residential materials (windows, fences, roofs, etc.), automobiles and bicycles.

 Day, evening, and night versions of the above tile sets
 Sample maps (project data)

It consists of tiles A1, A2, A4, A3, and B.
The set also includes variations of the same tileset for daytime, evening, and nighttime, allowing you to create different effects based on the time of day.
Please enjoy creating various effects by composing your own patterns.


■Materials included

Tile A2: 8 types of grass and soil for parks, 8 tile sets suitable for shopping and residential areas
